content:
Hello everyone.
I am currently working on a project and I want to import this file. However, in my version of Mathlib, it doesn't exist. I looked for it in the 

.lake/packages/mathlib

folder and it was not there, so I figured that I had an old version of Mathlib. I therefore tried to update it from the command line using 

curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/master/lean-toolchain -o lean-toolchain

and

lake update

That apparently did not change anything.
Does someone know what I did wrong?
Johannes Folttmann has marked this topic as resolved.

Oopsie daisy!
I overlooked the configurations in lakefile.toml. Once I changed the "rev" setting to "v4.20.1", lake updated to the right toolchain.
